Scroll Margin

# Scroll Margin

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                 | Support     |
| --------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
scroll-m-{n}
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-m-[n]
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-mx-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-mx-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-my-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-my-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-mt-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-mt-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-mr-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-mr-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-mb-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-mb-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-ml-{n}
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
scroll-ml-[n]
``` | 🌐 Web only |
